mapper.insert: insert into ATTENDCHECK( att_id, stu_id, attend_date, attend_status )values( (select (nvl(max(to_number(att_id)),0)+1) from ATTENDCHECK) ,(select stu_id from student where stu_name=#{stu_name}) ,to_date(#{attend_date},'yyyy-mm-dd') ,#{attend_status} )
mapper.select: select a.ATT_ID "att_id" ,s.stu_name "stu_name" ,a.stu_id "stu_id" ,to_char(a.ATTEND_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') "attend_date" ,a.ATTEND_STATUS "attend_status" from ATTENDCHECK a,STUDENT s where a.stu_id = s.stu_id
